website_summaries.verdict: A good mattress with a thicker bulk best used on short platform beds needing some extra height.
pros: Pure gel and foam materials offer a lot of flex and comfort compared to springs
Surface is hypoallergenic for sleepers with various allergies
Good for king and queen beds
cons: The mattress might not provide enough support and firmness for people used to box spring beds

customer_reviews.title: Don't be a skeptic!
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable and better quality than the $1200 Beautyrest it replaced (and at $300 we can replace this more often!). I love that I don't disturb my husband when I turn over during the night and we both wake up feeling well-rested. It's also quite light and easy to move around. It's the mattress of the future as far as I'm concerned!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.P

customer_reviews.title: So Great (and Cheap) That We Ordered Another One
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought a queen for a guest bedroom, and every guest we've had had loved the bed. We also have slept on it for several nights because our main king-sized bed started sinking on one side (I am 130lbs, and my husband is 170lbs). Mind you, we spent $1,500 on that bed. Only lasted a couple years before it began losing firmness. Very disappointing when one spends that kind of money on something for it to start failing within the first couple years of use. Super happy with our purchase--it was actually cheaper than the queen for the king when we purchased it via LinenSpa and not Amazon (more than likely because of shipping costs).
customer_reviews.author: Toast

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: love it, puffed right up to about 8 1/2 inches in just a few minutes.. slept on it same nite. kinda firm, but nice that it dont sink down too much and create a pocket, others spent way more and say this is just as comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Thompson's Custom Builders

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and nice support
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our Farm which is our weekend getaway. It did the job. Very comfortable and nice support. I noticed that some people thought this mattress was too hard; all I can think of is that maybe they are used to sleeping on super soft mattresses. Great mattress, can't beat the price and it was delivered within 2 days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Two years later...still happy...foam mattress veterans...
customer_reviews.text: Two years later, still very happy. This is our third memory foam mattress. The gel definitely spreads out the heat...we live in FL...so overheating "in" a memory foam mattress is a real issue. Seems to be holding up pretty well...some of these tend to make "canoes" where you sleep since you can't flip these mattresses...only spin them. The cover is comfortable and quiet...our last foam mattress the cover had to be replaced...noisy when turning over in bed. Did not notice any objectionable odor on opening the compressed packaging. Did wait a couple of days before using it the first time so it would have plenty/extra time to expand and stabilize. Would buy another one of these for sure.
customer_reviews.author: likeparty

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is AMAZING. We were grown-up children
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is AMAZING. We were grown-up children, with a mattress on the floor, before we decided to upgrade to this and a real bed frame. This did have a funk to it for the first few days, but it aired out quickly (you could easily put a fan or two on it to speed this up). Sleep was a painful thing on our old mattress, now I fall asleep quicker, sleep deeper, and wake up able to move and get up. The firmness seems a little much at first, but after a minute or two you sink in and it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. I am 180 pounds my girl is 120 pounds and we both sleep very confy one it. The mattress arrived on time with no damages. It was easy to transport to the room. Initially it had a "new foam" smell but after a few days it disappeared. Seriously this is our first memory foam mattress and we both love it. The price is very affordable in comparison with top brands and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: askfortamn45y

customer_reviews.title: Happy daughter, satisfied parents.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 12 year old daughter. We built a really cool loft bed for her. She loves it. Sleeps like a baby on it. Never had any smell issues etc... Buying another one for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Shimi Goldberger

customer_reviews.title: didn't look like 10 inches of mattress but it is
customer_reviews.text: didn't look like 10 inches of mattress but it is. It is very firm. I have successfully recycled the packaging, what a surprise when the carton came I truly thought I received the wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping experience
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping experience......aches and pains aren't a frequent thing these days..... now if I could just find a good pillow it will be even better!
customer_reviews.author: scriptwr

customer_reviews.title: ... is the first mattress I've ever bought and I'm glad I did my research
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mattress I've ever bought and I'm glad I did my research. For the price I paid I am extremely happy with this, it practically absorbs you when you lay on it but it's firm enough to provide support, and the gel keeps it from getting too hot. I've always slept very hot, to the point that I sometimes sweat when I sleep even without sheets, but this mattress has been very comfortable for the few weeks I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Still Firm After a Year
customer_reviews.text: With the ability to purchase memory foam mattresses through Amazon, I think more mattress stores will go out of business in the future. Shipped to the door convenience. While they are a little heavy, this mattress was perfect for our needs. It was a medium thickness and I think over time, it is a good idea to rotate the mattress to keep the foam from sagging in the area where you sleep often. While you can't flip it because it's one-sided, rotating it has helped the thickness maintain shape. Worth the price. I think if we replace it, we'll get a firmer one. But it's still comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rootes Author

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable! We bought this for my son who recently upgraded to a big boy bed. The bed puffed up within a couple hours, but there was one edge that never quite filled out. There was a smell initially, so we left it to air out for a couple days before using it. It's really comfortable and for the price, it's a great deal. My son has slept so well in it!
customer_reviews.author: KKNYC

customer_reviews.title: Ungreatful kids!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so angry that I bought this for my son, because his bed is more comfortable than mine and we just got a new mattress. When he gets in trouble I kick him out of his bed and make him sleep in mine with my wife. I really would buy this mattress for myself only in a king size, it is so very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: sven

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly comfort at a devilishly low price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress! Firm yet comfortable, it is a bargain for the high build level and can hold it's own against foam mattresses costing 3 times as much. One of the best buys I've made in several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful Mattress....so happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress last week...I had a twin hide-a-bed with it own mattress...My husband has been ill and needed to sleep downstairs. He has been on my sofa...which was ok, I decided to try this bed as the reviews were great and so was the price...I checked the Leesa Bed which was expensive...So I ordered this mattress..It came in a few days. It was heavy so I had help setting it up..so easy...AND...must say this bed is just great...It is as a great height of 10 inches...It is so comfortable...I tried it...My husband loves the comfort and rest he gets..I recommend this bed...it is amazing...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable mattress for the price! Bought this to go with my Baxton Studio Madison Black Modern Bed (mouthful), and it fits perfectly. The only downside is that after awhile it does begin to sag where you sleep and has become a bit hard to get out of without having to roll yourself out. It also gets very hard when its cold, however I assume most mattresses made from the same materials are like this. After a few minutes in bed it usually warms up and softens with your body heat.
customer_reviews.author: AJ L

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye, Coil Springs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress as a replacement for a traditional coil mattress. My first concern was that it wouldn't support my 6'7" 300 lb frame. After the recommended 48hr waiting period I gave it a try, and was amazed. I'd like it just a little firmer, but the support is excellent. With the old mattress I would wake up groggy and sore. This mattress is the best night's sleep I've had in longer than I can remember.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress and value
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is excellent. We bought one for our vacation home and we slept SO well on it. I can't believe this sells for under $300. It's easily comparable to high end traditional mattresses in terms of comfort and sleep quality. I also like that it comes with a huge warranty. Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EastBronxGuy

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Our opinion on this mattress (my husband and I) is that it is fantastic. It's not too soft or too hard. The thickness is just great for his 200lb body. Many memory foam mattresses cannot accommodate his size and he sinks into them. This one has been great. Shipping was great too. Arrived in a medium sized box - perhaps about the same size as a decent sized Christmas tree box. My husband remarked that he liked this mattress better than his parents' $10,000 memory foam mattress. I have to agree. Overall we are very pleased. Hope that this company stands true to their warranty should we ever need to access that option. (Hope we never do!)
customer_reviews.author: TonightTonight

customer_reviews.title: opened the box up and this huge mattress comes flopping out kind of awesome. When you first take it out it kind ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in the next two days in a big box. opened the box up and this huge mattress comes flopping out kind of awesome. When you first take it out it kind of stinks so don't expect to sleep on it right away. After leaving it for the night even though it says to leave for two, it had fully taken it's shape and was as comfortable as it is now. For the price I would say go for it. Only thing I still haven't figured out how to register for the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: William Brown

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT! I noticed a difference the first night I slept on it, minimal body aches, it's firm yet soft, it literally hugs your body. So easy to set up my 6 year old and I did it. came out of the box easily, two layers of plastic easily removed and it expanded to it's full thickness in about an hour. I slept on it the same night I put it on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Lizy

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year later it's awful and I wake up with a back ache
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year later it's awful and I wake up with a back ache; I emailed the warranty folks at Linen Spa only to learn that the 25 year warranty is a hoax.
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: More Than Just Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this mattress and appreciate the 25-year warranty. It works well with the Pragmatic articulating bed and arrived timely. When we first opened, I was a little nervous as it had been compressed for shipping. But within a couple of hours it was the full 8” as described and I slept on it that night. I never noticed any noxious smells as desribed by some reviewers. I have not yet purchased the Twin XL linens, but the regular twin sheets are sufficing temporarily, with a little adjustment while making the bed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Debi

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One in a full size and one in a queen. I love it. It's so comfortable. Feels like sleeping in w cloud. And it hit here so fast. Three days after I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: The best mattress for the money
customer_reviews.text: Superb mattress. I bought it for a guest room now I find myself wanting to sleep on it every night. Firm but soft if that makes sense, holds its shape, forms to the body great back support love it
customer_reviews.author: C. Eley

customer_reviews.title: Medium/firm to firm
customer_reviews.text: Very supportive and comfortable. Wasn't sure if the bed would really be as thick as we ordered it once we took it out of the box and unrolled it, but once we let it sit for 24 hours it was full and perfext. Being a memory foam, it does keep you warm throughout the night, be advised it you are a hot sleeper. At first, I thought the bed was too firm when I first sat on it, but once by body contoured to the bed after a couple of minutes, it didn't feel too firm and I have great nights of sleep. Deffenitly will order my future beds with Linnen spa, csnt beat the price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great basic mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great basic mattress. Comfortable and cheap. It's maybe starting to get some divots, but for the price and comfort, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Linenspa mattress. We bought a 5 inch twin before for my kid and I loved laying on it. So we decided to get the 8 inch for ourselves. It’s been almost a week and I really like it. It’s just firm enough but it relieves pressure on my hips and shoulders (I am a size sleeper). My husband likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these. They are great to sleep on and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Campisi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress for the price ($360)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mattress for the price ($360)! It is firm just enough and sooo comfortable! Back doesn't hurt anymore;) Review after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mattress
customer_reviews.text: It's so comfortable that I now sleep in the bedroom with that mattress on the bed. Literally moved out of my other bedroom that also has memory foam mattress bed from another company. This is a great mattress you won't be disappointed highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: B. Poles

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just one tiny problem (nothing major)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed, I've had it for about a year now and still just as good as when I got it. Only one flaw really and I'm sure it's diffrent for everyone, but, when I took it out of the box and let it sit for a day one corner didn't seem to comeout right. it's not really bad and it doesn't really afffect how my wife and I sleep but it just looked funny when you notice it. Overall it's a great memoryfoam matress (in a box) at a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael klausing

customer_reviews.title: I sit on it & the mattress just squishes together like a cotton ball
customer_reviews.text: Very soft & mushy! I need a firm mattress due to back injuries. This was advertised as "Orthopedic" and "Firm". It is neither. I sit on it & the mattress just squishes together like a cotton ball.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: so soft and so comfortable. I truly love it
customer_reviews.text: The package came earlier. It was the coolest think I ever seen. It was in a box and it seemed so small, but when I opened it grew so quickly on the right dimensions. To not mention when I lay on it: so soft and so comfortable. I truly love it. I bought it for my little son's bunk bed. He was so happy!!! The price is much cheaper then what you can find in the store. A real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Simona

customer_reviews.title: Beware--very soft mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all as described in the product description. It was not medium firm as advertised. The one we received was extremely soft. I am 6 feet tall and weigh 160 pounds. When I lay down on the bed I sunk almost to the bottom frame. The underlying foam is not strong enough. If you are looking for something with support--do not purchase this. I had to request a refund after the first two nights because I woke up sore each morning from sleeping so poorly from sinking into the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: PTRdallas

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: I don't generally have sensitive skin but after opening and using this bed I got a serious skin rash. My arms, chest, legs, and face were covered in a rash and my face was very swollen. But the bed is so comfortable and the price was awesome, I didn't want to give it up. I bought a bedbug/waterproof encasement from the same brand and now my rash is clearing up. Also, I'm short and over 300lbs and the bed is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the mattress, very comfortable, great for the price, especially when the furniture store we went to wanted $11000, thats ELEVEN THOUSAND dollars for a mattress that was good and comfortable also. It's the Quality he said, well this mattress has good quality and i could buy several of these for what they wanted for their "Quality" mattress.
customer_reviews.author: charles wright

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We had this mattress for 3yrs and started to have back problems because this mattress will sink in. They have horrible warranty policy and I do not recommend this mattress for everyday bed. I’m not a heavy person and this mattress only lasted 3 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: Bed was easy to lay on the bed and open
customer_reviews.text: Bed was easy to lay on the bed and open. Took 30 seconds to fill up. Me and my husband have been sleeping on ours for about 3 weeks now and we are still in love with it. I usually have back problems and I wake up not wanting to get out of bed because I'm so comfortable. I'm in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: It is not perfect but the price is fair
customer_reviews.text: 2020 --- Bought another 8 inch King size matters, wait for 48 hours but the mattress extension only from 7 (corner) to 7.5 (max) inch. The mattress is firm enough so i am not plush inside. 2016 --- The delivery package is a bit old, but mattress inside is fresh and new, it is fine for me. All dimension are correct even greater than posted information after expended for few hours. The foam matters is firm enough to have a good sleep, of course can not compare with latex matters. But it is worth with this amount.
customer_reviews.author: OVISE

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Finally upgraded from a full to a queen bed. I was nervous at first buying a mattress I never tested before and a memory foam one which is nothing I've ever slept on before. And to boot my boyfriend was completely against memory foam. However, this bed changed his mind. It's comfy, you don't sink all the way in it ( which was his fear ). For the price, I'm very happy with it. I've had it for about 5 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind713

customer_reviews.title: Sags leaves a hole
customer_reviews.text: It very quickly sagged on each side where we sleep and there is a hump in the middle. I rotated and tried my best. Its been giving us back pain and we are young and never had problems before. We are not too heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Feels strange. The frist couple inches you sink right through. Then you feel this hard surface of more foam. I also get super hot in this mattress and I get headaches if I stay in bed for too long I guess that's a good thing though. The bed definitely takes some getting used to but it's ok for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Codoje

customer_reviews.title: Sleep tight and right.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is so comfortable. I no longer toss and turn during the night. And I snore less...LOL
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gumbs

customer_reviews.title: ... on the bed and immediately said "wow this is nice. " It came in an easy to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: Every one of my friends that has been over to my new apartment in the past few weeks has sat down on the bed and immediately said "wow this is nice." It came in an easy to carry box (NYC walk-up tested) and unrolled and puffed up easily, no odor or scent. Better than any bed I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Winter

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress, it is a bit more firm than I would like but I still sleep great on it and it doesnt get hot or cold. It is not heavy like a conventional mattress.
customer_reviews.author: nissi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bed. And unbeatable for the price range
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bed. And unbeatable for the price range. My bed came with a few marks on it. Which appeared to be scoring marks. But didn't really bother me since it will be covered by a sheet 100% of time. Truely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derick S

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Soft but not too soft. Very slight smell as all foam mattresses have but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Adena

customer_reviews.title: A really nice mattress at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice mattress. It looks great and feels great. It has a cover (although I got another) that you can wash and it just unzips. It feels mid-firm (not too hard and not too soft) and seems to rebound well after a nights sleep. It unfolded in a few hrs and had no smell that I could smell. A really nice mattress at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Billieg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I do enjoy sleeping on it, as does my great dane...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Trigg

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome! Just the right amount of support and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these mattresses for our teenage daughters newly remodeled room. They are awesome! Just the right amount of support and very comfortable. We will purchase this brand again for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mtwalk

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is fantastic. Give it about 24 hours to fully inflate
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is fantastic. Give it about 24 hours to fully inflate. It is good and firm, with the three inch gel foam top giving the perfect amount of comfort. I plan on ordering two more in queen size for my guest bedrooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter breaking out cause of this bed
customer_reviews.text: It has some ttpe of fiberglass under the bedcover n it literally stays on ur skin like insulation and it itches bad my daughter has been breaking out and its bcause of this stuff under the bedcover
customer_reviews.author: Craig harrell

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed a while now and it's been great. It's firm and supportive but you do kind of sink into it a little, which took some getting used to. It expanded as the instructions indicated and smelled for about a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Corners of mattress is only 8 inches
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this linenspa gel memory foam 10 inches. But the corners of the bed only expanded to 8 inches. Sitting on the edge of the bed is uncomfortable. Looks like I will need to purchase a topper and I'm not sure that will resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: slowneasy

customer_reviews.title: My back is no longer sore in the morning and I sleep easy since you can't feel any movement from my boyfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I've only been sleeping on this mattress for a few days it is a keeper! My back is no longer sore in the morning and I sleep easy since you can't feel any movement from my boyfriend or pets. Great deal on a memory foam mattress for sure! Get a platform bed frame for a better idea since box springs are kind of useless.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Stillings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am 44 years old, and this is the nicest and most comfortable mattress, i'v ever owned / slept on, thank you for the speedy delivery, with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: She love it, but it has been cold here
customer_reviews.text: The Linenspa 8 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress was for my wife. She love it, but it has been cold here, so she has an extra cover the gel right now can hardly wait till the warmer weather gets here to try out the Gel. Her body temp. is higher than mine. She also likes a firm mattress & said that it feels so good to sleep on. She lets everyone try it out to see how they like the feel of it. I am so glad that we went to Amazon to get mattress. The Price was nice & you keep us informed when we would get the merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Yacko

customer_reviews.title: Like Sleeping on a Rock
customer_reviews.text: This mattress gave me so much back and hip pain. It was like sleeping on a rock. We lasted about a month with it before donating it to the church.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost two months and this I blame for making me over sleep lol. It is to comfortable and I have the best sleep on this and everyone compliments me on how comfortable it is
customer_reviews.author: Javier Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: I will only buy Gel foam mattresses after purchasing this my first one.
customer_reviews.text: Love the Gel memory foam mattress. It is not only comfortable, but also stays cool helping you sleep better. no complaints. I would rather have this mattress then pay $700.00 or more for an overpriced Sealy or one of the other major mattress makers.
customer_reviews.author: Allan C. Kolakowski

customer_reviews.title: awesome mattress! It does support my shoulders and back
customer_reviews.text: awesome mattress! It does support my shoulders and back. I don't sink into the mattress. The firmness is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for two months now and I absolutely love it! I was a bit worried due to the mixed reviews. Some people said it was too soft other said it was too firm. I found it to be medium firm with just enough softness for me. The package arrived three days after I ordered it and the mattress inflated to the full ten inches in about a minute. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissolve into a great nights' sleep
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is just soft and hard enough to be perfect. No bouncy partner movements - you don't feel it when the person next to you moves. When you lie down on this - you feel like you mold into the mattress. Very very comfortable and not too thick to be awkward for fitted sheets and not too thin to feel cheap! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wee Winston

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for about a month and a half now and I'm happy with this purchase. I have not woken up with aches and pains and it's just so comfortable. I have woken up over heated but that could be due to getting older :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and feel!
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and are comfortable so far. One inflated a bit higher than other but not a big deal because both appear to be at or around 10 inches. First gel.so the sink in takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZINGGGGGG, I have very bad neck and shoulder problems and just got over surgery in march and this bed has been such a blessing especially for the price. I recommend it to everyone. I just bought it with a metal bed frame and didn't need a box spring. It comes in a box which made me nervous because I didn't understand how I was suppose to sleep on a bed that could fit in the box size it came in. However, It takes about an hour to expand and its amazed me.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Baty

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly Comfortable for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure I would like a gel memory foam mattress but this one changed my mind. I bought this for a day bed and found it to be very comfortable and got a good nights sleep. Will definitely consider getting one of these for my king size bed when the time arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Serred

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in my out-dated waterbed frame
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in my out-dated waterbed frame. The frame is gorgeous mahogany and I couldn't part with it. Had this idea to put memory foam into it. Wow! What a great Bed it makes!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse

customer_reviews.title: EVERYBODY LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my airbnb room and every guest is saying how comfortable the mattress is so i guess it must be really good. now i am opening another airbnb room but unfortunately i can no longer find 10" mattress from Linenspa, now they are selling only 8" one :( So i decided to try LUCID 10".
customer_reviews.author: Monika B

customer_reviews.title: Great night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully comfortable though quite firm. Arrived on time. Would give it five stars except corners never really expanded to full eight inches, stayed about seven, giving a somewhat rounded appearance.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Decent Purchase. Don't regret it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was just a tad more in the memory foam layer. It's ok. My hips don't hurt. May be me still wishing I was in a king size instead of a twin xl.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McMahan

customer_reviews.title: I love it more and more every night
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for about 2 weeks now. I love it more and more every night. It is however, very firm. Takes a bit of getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more disappointed with this purchase. First of all, the mattress did not expand to 10 inches consistently around the entire mattress. The one corner only expanded to about 5 inches. I waited to review thinking it would expand fully and after two weeks it still hasn't. Also, every time you move it takes more than a few moments to expand back in the place you left, leaving you feeling very uncomfortable. We are very disappointed with this purchase and would not recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Sleep Number it replaced
customer_reviews.text: I had a twin sleep number bed After a while it's sagged. You have to sleep in the middle of the sleep number bed. The sides are not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Chiarilli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE IT!!!! we will NEVER buy another spring mattress!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my kiddos because we all love memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kiddos because we all love memory foam,...... and this is the best mattress ever at a great price! You do not even need a pillow! Fabulous quality and so so comfy, so much so that I am buying one for our room in replace of our old queen mattress :-) if you want to sleep heavenly I say this its so worth it! My kids have never slept so good :-) can't wait to get ours:-)!!! Thank you for shipping so fast and for the great quality of this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin & Brittney Moore

customer_reviews.title: I feel like Goldilocks because it's just right.
customer_reviews.text: It does not stab me with springs since there are none! It's firm, yet not too firm. I feel like Goldilocks because it's just right.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress came on time and was exactly as advertised. The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is it is a little firmer than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Horrible
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate them zero stars I would. At first the mattress was really firm and I just thought it would have to take a little time to get softer.....It has been a year and a half and its just as firm now as it was when I unboxed it! 0 out of 5 stars would not recommend this terrible mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Robert English

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I have both slept on it because it ia ao comfortable. Fast easy delivery from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This bed is for my 4 year old son. My husband and I have both slept on it because it ia ao comfortable. Fast easy delivery from Amazon. We couldn't ask for a better mattress for this price.
customer_reviews.author: cassi gladstone

customer_reviews.title: It is honestly the most comfortable mattress. She sleeps like a rock and loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 year old daughter. It is honestly the most comfortable mattress. She sleeps like a rock and loves her new big kid bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress, been getting the best night sleep since we started using it. I replaced a major brand mattress that was killing my back, now I awake without any back pain. My wife also sleep better than before. So we both give its 5 stars, so look like its a 10 stars. I hope its last a long time, time will tell, but as of now best sleeping mattress I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. Reed

customer_reviews.title: What a mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The best mattress we've ever owned. This is the second one we purchased because we liked it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wilding

customer_reviews.title: Both thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering a mattress online, but... This arrived super fast. No gross new mattress smell. Inflated quickly. Super comfy. I've been sleeping soundly ever since. Would totally buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this mattress 5 years and have given it up. Had I been able to afford to have replaced it sooner I would have. Way to soft, doesn’t snap back. Very uncomfortable if you have any back problems. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Christy Stedry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent mattress, on the firm side but I get a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Deering

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and very comfortable. We are using this in a guest room and so far, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mike21228

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, use on roll out trundle bed. will order one for main bed when one is needed
customer_reviews.author: Lawanda Youngren

customer_reviews.title: Incredible buy for a medium-to-firm 8-inch (low profile) memory foam mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the thinnest memory foam mattresses (8-inches) that I could find that was somewhat firm. We have an adjustable bed, which raised our platform bed higher than I would like. I also wanted a firm mattress. This is indeed firm (not as firm as the "Americana" from Amerisleep, but with $750 price difference, I am willing to give up a tiny bit of firmness). If you are looking for a soft to medium-firm, don't get this mattress! But if you are looking for medium-firm to firm, absolutely. It's fabulous ... I can't believe what a great price this one is. It seems to keep reasonably cool and we are very, very happy with it! High recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kara J. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't believe that a mattress could come in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe that a mattress could come in a box when I cut it open and cut off the plastic I just start forming out into a mattress the same day all of it even out . My old mattress was hurting my back when I slept on this the first night no back pain it's worth my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing how it hugs your body
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing how it hugs your body. We were amazed how it was packed and how fast it went to the proper size and no curling back cause it was all rolled up but it was like magic how it unrolled into amazing feeling mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. After looking at more expensive mattresses, we settled on this one. Have been sleeping on it for almost five months and we have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: sarah Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: super easy to get out of package
customer_reviews.text: came on time, super easy to get out of package,,packaged well...good looking, no problems i can see, felt good to lie on. just what it said it was, medium firm. i already had a bottom mattress, i have this in our cabin which we will be renting out for vacationers, very happy with it so far...
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT - THANKS LINENSPA!
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 and hoped they were okay--2 years in and they are better than okay! High quality product!
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and clean and simple look for ...
customer_reviews.text: Frame is strong and as advertised. Ordered a queen sized bed and it fit perfectly. Easy to put together and clean and simple look for our guest rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Spence

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Super deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super deal for the price. Very good support if you are looking for a firm mattress. I bought the Structures HIGHRISE foldable bed frame to go with and they are a perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Every person who slept on it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Every person who slept on it, also love it! I had a friend buying the same one the next day after he stay with me for the weekend. :) Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ailany Icassatti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything i hoped for.I have herniated discs, fractures, all kinds of back pain.first time in years i woke up without back pain.i couldnt believe i slept all night no waking up trying to get comfortable will reccomend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LINENSPA 8 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress - Dual-Layered - CertiPUR-US Certified - Medium Firm - 10 Year U.S. Warranty - Queen Size
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:8-inchBest Value The LINENSPA 8" Cool Gel Memory Foam Mattress was designed to provide maximum comfort and value. We utilize the highest quality components and best technologies to offer you a premium mattress at an unbeatable, direct-from-the-manufacturer price. Best Components Our Cool gel memory foam provides superior pressure point relief and a more comfortable sleeping temperature. Our bamboo cover is soft, hypoallergenic and dust mite resistant. All our foam products are CertiPUR-US certified which means that they have been independently tested and certified to meet the highest standards of quality and safety. This mattress features 2" of plush gel memory foam and 6" of high density supportive base foam.
feature_bullets: 8 inch mattress with 2" of gel memory foam, 6" of high-density support foam and a super-soft bamboo cover
Medium firm feel mattress that is compressed, rolled and shipped in a box for easy transportation
Helps to relieve pain and pressure points by correctly aligning the spine and by supporting the natural curves of your head, neck and shoulders
Durable, long lasting memory foam is constructed with open cell technology to create a more durable foam and includes an impressive 10-Year Warranty
CertiPUR-US certified (no harmful odors), resitant to dust mites and safe for youth - Queen Size: 60" x 80"
